title: (skin idea) Vampire Queen Janna and Cait with Graves as vampire hunters

embed.description: Hi all) My name is Angelina, Im a concept artist and terrible illustrator ;3im playing league since 2season (better i spent this time and money on drawing ;D) and totally inloved with this game.I will made an Harrowing skins set for Janna (vampire queen) Cayt and Graves (vampire/witch hunters) - because i miss that atmosphere in league)So i will try to recreate Van Hellsing film (2012) setting, but in some casual wayI cant describe it well because of my terrible english, so soon i will post a reference board.

body:
I just wanted to create smth elegant with skins. So i hold up my crazy ideas as katarina ballerina ;D, or annie from monsters inc, and desided to create some sexy and elegant for Janna{{champion:40}} , other guys ({{champion:51}} {{champion:104}}  from party was created for party ;D Just wanted bot combo wombo, with supp, adc and Jungler

Hope you guys like it, always was too shy to made some fan stuff for league

https://cdnb.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/009/162/793/large/angelina-chernyak-gamefield.jpg?1517458333

https://cdnb.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/009/162/715/large/angelina-chernyak-riot-art-contest-2017-harrowing-illustration-as.jpg?1517458006


https://cdna.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/009/162/778/large/angelina-chernyak-riot-art-contest-2017-harrowing-illustration-as-1.jpg?1517458244

https://cdna.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/009/162/794/large/angelina-chernyak-graves-sketch.jpg?1517458335

https://cdnb.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/009/162/795/large/angelina-chernyak-janna-sketch.jpg?1517458338

https://cdna.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/009/162/792/large/angelina-chernyak-caitlyn-sketch.jpg?1517458319

replies.body:
That's Miss Fortune on the splashart, not Caitlyn.
Strange.

I like the idea, we could use some more skins with classical horror themes.
im actually agree) Everybody say that x) i main mf, so maybe my heart wanted to draw her more than cait(
no it isn't the person in the splash has a single Sniper NOT Dual guns

No see, the splash art has a Big Hat and Oversized Gun, which are clearly Caitlyn things.
Whereas Miss Fortune has the Big Hat and Oversized Gun_S_.
Totally different and in no way remotely the same thing.
So much better than the harrowing skins we got most recently.

Yeah the last two cycles of harrowing skins were more like carnival themed ones
{{sticker:sg-ahri-3}}
they were so bad I dont even remember what they were :D

Graves and Miss Fortune are an excellent pick for the vampire hunters,though I feel Janna as a vampire is kinda random(she still looks good though)
{{champion:50}} and {{champion:133}} would fit probably better as vampires(just switch the brids for bats)

Uuuuuuuh, Quinn would be perfect.
Bats, bats everywhere!
I would agree. However, on initial look, I thought it was Syndra because of the swirling purple ball bats. I think Janna is a bit of an odd choice for a vampire.
you never know how much you need something till you see it...god i want them any skin for janna is a skin a want and the graves splash looks great the splash alone sold the skin for me

As a Janna main, I completely support this idea. Not only is the concept and artwork amazing, Janna doesn't have any spooky skin. All of her skins are little more than an outfit change, with an exception of Star Guardian where she's still made to look all cute and pretty and Sacred Sword where she has more of a mysterious and elegant vibe going on.

> [{quoted}](name=Support Boyyy,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=nfr5VGy8,comment-id=0017,timestamp=2018-02-16T04:31:21.198+0000)
>
> As a Janna main, I completely support this idea. Not only is the concept and artwork amazing, Janna doesn't have any spooky skin. All of her skins are little more than an outfit change, with an exception of Star Guardian where she's still made to look all cute and pretty and Sacred Sword where she has more of a mysterious and elegant vibe going on.

MAN I LOVE YOU, THANK YOU! You understood my idea perfectrly! Im actually adc mainer, and have 2 best friends who supp me on bot, and both of them told that all last Janna skins look like starguardian chromas. And she hasnt smth really sexy and dark like))
So i made her for my friends
Personally I don’t think Janna is the most suited for the role but Caitlyn and Graves seem interesting

I absolutely love this skin concept.  I would hope that they would do an entire line of skins with the vampire vs vampire hunter theme.  I yearn for the day when Soraka can have a vampiress skin using her blood to rain down destruction and heal while using her mental prowess to get in their heads and be like stfu! It would just fit so well thematically with her abilities <3

Money wise I feel like this would definitely be a good concept for Riot to jump on since there are tons of people obsessed with vampires and the like.
ah thank you so much! If people really think so - it makes me want to create another fanmade works)

janna looks gorgeous, i love it. and it does look like mf lmfao.

i want a bewitched mf and janna though, i think theyd be cute.
no more janna skins pls

tbh i thought i see fortue, but looking closely Caitlyn have one long rifle gun, but it should hold in two hands like a sniper does
i really the vampire skin but there is other champs can should get this vampie concepts
{{champion:25}} is appropiate for vampire queen tbh, she have ghost bride , would it be appropiate for vampie skin? maybe...
{{champion:8}} this is defintely should be good for vampire skin becuz vampie is blood thirst, so does to vlad. idk if he can get vampire skin since he have blood lord skin, i guess....
{{champion:50}} , just by looking at it, he should be the vampire king or known as Dracula
{{champion:28}} can be a vampire "hoe"
{{champion:60}} idk about this, but she can be like a vampire queen, just use bats as her minions
{{champion:83}} can be the big vampire kings can summon bats

idk, this is my opinions for champs that can be look good on vampire skin

@maoakari, nice spalsh art, idk Rito can take a look at this, since the don't listen to us "bullshiting"
Cait's first design reminds me of Final Fantasy: War of Lions. Man the memories, thank you for this lol, oh and the skins are absolutely astonishing, wp.
Holy crap that looks really good. I’d love to get a vampire hunter skin for Cait.
soo good ^__^

upvoted for being actual original content and not a lazy skinline continuation that recycles assets and colors.

thank you for taking the high road and going for OC stuff instead of "Arclight Graves", "Sweetheart Janna" or "Elderwood Miss Fortune".
+1

I would actually really like some sort of dark, evil, just general opposite of 'good' themed skin for Janna seeing as she doesn't have one when some of the other poke supports do

(deepsea nami, pentakill sona, reaper soraka, whatever that one lulu skin is with the cats)

Ahah THANK YOU)
and first my idea was create 3 characters (if you remember Van Hellsing film) 3 sisters vampires, I wanted to made 2 sexy supps as Soraka and Janna and 1 agressive supp/midlaner as syndra/zyra etc as their main sister)) But decided to make 2 adc as Anna and Hellsing in film =/=
Would be perfect for Halloween this year

Thanks God for artists! 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}} 

This are sooooo beautiful to look at, Graves looks, MF's hat

I would love to have these as actual skins to play in game!

I'd have interest in all 3 no joke! 
Last harrowing, I didnt like any of them..... 
sorry Riot :/ 
but hey, I bought myself Heartseeker Orianna today so yuo get my RP either way 
{{sticker:sg-lulu}}
I enjoy the Idea but, Try for more high tech I honestly think it would look a lot cooler and make Cait look less like MF. Great Thoughts Though!

i fking love the skins i wish if they use them .
i{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

This is a great idea but I don't see Janna being by herself. Great job on splash art too! Totally jealous :P! Cait and Graves is a great combo so how about Janna and Evelynn maybe. This skin idea is just right up Evelynn's alley.{{champion:28}}
yea yea, i writed earlier - that was just crazy idea)

It's interesting for sure, but my only question is; Why Janna as a the Vampire Queen?

Her quotes, theme's and abilities wouldn't really match imo? 

Why is Graves the only one wearing all of his clothes? Showing some chest would make his skin fit in much better amongst the other 2. 

Why Caitlyn instead of the more easily suitable {{champion:21}} who is already a hunter of sorts? 

The art is gorgeous, the rendering is top quality.

But just a lot of the thematic/champion/appearance choices really boggle my mind.

ill try to explain ><
I kno about it and yeah im deep known in league lore, but, its contest its not official) So i wanted to do what ive always want, Janna's skins all in the same kind way, here we Have a Halloween event, where everybody can wear another personality. Its smth like a reload tale. And sure i thought about her abilities, healing ult with bats storm and etc. I kno that there is alot easy suitable champs for this) But ive wanted have fun) 

About graves - lover ull see alot of concepts of his costume, i decided to make maximum light changes to go some way: Epic janna for 3000 rp, cayt for 1850 rp ang cheap graves for 950) So i decided to made him the most poor)

Anout Mf i know) I told few messages earlier, that im main mf and maybe i didnt get the moment when Cait become her in art while rendering ;DDD  - in concepts of her u can see more suitable variations for cayt.

Maybe i was to stressed and make wrong decigions of my variations t.t

Impressive work :o

One of my favorite details is the Caitlin hat with the lit candles on it. Such a cool idea and looks really neat.

Nah man you got it all wrong...

Vampire Queen Vayne
Vampire Hunter Vladimir

Boom! Mind blown

Edit:

Forgot to say <3 in all seriousness
I'd start playing Graves so fast if that came out
VAMPIRE QUEEN EVELYNN PLS
Vayne is already basically a vampire hunter, she'd also make a good addition to this set.
i didnt have time) my idea was that Vayne gather this team and donate as batman for justice league, or as nemo for league of extraordinary jentlemans
Oh boy. Vampires. How original. Next is aliens.
why he said cait but there is a mf there

I just want a {{champion:5}} skin........ {{sticker:sg-janna}} 

But those concepts do look good, good job. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
